languages.text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл неуловимо изменился — в лице главы могущественной династии прорезались жесткие, хищные черты, а пожелтевшие глаза налились яростью.{/n} "Твой слуга слишком медленно болтает. Думаю, если отрезать ему ноги, он забормочет куда живее, ха!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл неуловимо изменился — в лице главы могущественной династии прорезались жесткие, хищные черты, а пожелтевшие глаза налились яростью.{/n} "Твой слуга слишком медленно болтает. Думаю, если отрезать ему ноги, он забормочет куда живее, ха!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл неуловимо изменился — в лице главы могущественной династии прорезались жесткие, хищные черты, а пожелтевшие глаза налились яростью.{/n} "Твой слуга слишком медленно болтает. Думаю, если отрезать ему ноги, он забормочет куда живее, ха!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that's hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features makes him resemble an animal of prey. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Hay algo distinto en Calligos Winterscale, aunque no aciertas a identificar qué. Su expresión muestra una nueva severidad que le confiere el aspecto de un depredador. Sus ojos ictéricos están llenos de ira.{/n} «Qué parsimonia muestra ese sirviente suyo al hablar. ¡Ja! ¡Seguro que si le cortamos las piernas musitará con más entusiasmo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay algo distinto en Calligos Winterscale, aunque no aciertas a identificar qué. Su expresión muestra una nueva severidad que le confiere el aspecto de un depredador. Sus ojos ictéricos están llenos de ira.{/n} «Qué parsimonia muestra ese sirviente suyo al hablar. ¡Ja! ¡Seguro que si le cortamos las piernas musitará con más entusiasmo!».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔身上发生了某种变化。虽然你不知道究竟是怎么回事，但他的仪表中流露着前所未有的严厉，整个人散发着类似掠食者的气场。他的黄眼睛里燃烧着怒火。{/n}“你的仆人说话太慢了。哈，我敢打赌，如果砍了他的腿，他应该能活泼不少！”
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔身上发生了某种变化。虽然你不知道究竟是怎么回事，但他的仪表中流露着前所未有的严厉，整个人散发着类似掠食者的气场。他的黄眼睛里燃烧着怒火。{/n}“你的仆人说话太慢了。哈，我敢打赌，如果砍了他的腿，他应该能活泼不少！”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale semble avoir changé d'une manière difficile à discerner. La dureté nouvelle de son visage lui donne un air de prédateur et ses yeux jaunes sont emplis de colère.{/n} « Votre serviteur est bien mou. Je suis sûr qu'il se mettrait à parler bien plus vite si on lui coupait les deux jambes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale semble avoir changé d'une manière difficile à discerner. La dureté nouvelle de son visage lui donne un air de prédateur et ses yeux jaunes sont emplis de colère.{/n} « Votre serviteur est bien mou. Je suis sûr qu'il se mettrait à parler bien plus vite si on lui coupait les deux jambes ! »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}捕らえがたい何らかの形で、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの何かが変わった。彼の特徴に新たな厳しさが加わり、まるで捕食者がごとき雰囲気をまとわせる。黄色の目は怒りに満ちていた。{/n}「お前のしもべはなんて口下手なんだ。脚を切り落とせば、呟きももっと生き生きとしたものになるだろうな！」
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}捕らえがたい何らかの形で、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの何かが変わった。彼の特徴に新たな厳しさが加わり、まるで捕食者がごとき雰囲気をまとわせる。黄色の目は怒りに満ちていた。{/n}「お前のしもべはなんて口下手なんだ。脚を切り落とせば、呟きももっと生き生きとしたものになるだろうな！」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder hat sich verändert, es lässt sich jedoch nicht genau sagen, in welcher Weise. Seine Züge sind rauer geworden, was ihn gefährlich wirken lässt, räuberisch. Seine gelblichen Augen sind voller Zorn.{/n} "Wie langsam Euer Diener spricht. Ha, ich wette, wenn man ihm die Beine abschneidet, ist sein Gemurmel gleich viel lebhafter!"
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder hat sich verändert, es lässt sich jedoch nicht genau sagen, in welcher Weise. Seine Züge sind rauer geworden, was ihn gefährlich wirken lässt, räuberisch. Seine gelblichen Augen sind voller Zorn.{/n} "Wie langsam Euer Diener spricht. Ha, ich wette, wenn man ihm die Beine abschneidet, ist sein Gemurmel gleich viel lebhafter!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale'de anlaması güç bir değişiklik var. Yüz ifadesindeki sertlik, ona vahşi bir hava katıyor. Sararmış gözleri, öfkeyle dolu.{/n} "Hizmetkârınız ne kadar da yavaş konuşuyormuş. Bacaklarını kesecek olsak bu mırıldanan hâlinden eser kalmazdı!"
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Calligos Winterscale in a way that is hard to pin down. A new harshness about his features gives him a predatory quality. His yellowed eyes are filled with rage.{/n} "What a slow talker that servant of yours is. Ha, I bet cutting off his legs would make his muttering a lot livelier!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale'de anlaması güç bir değişiklik var. Yüz ifadesindeki sertlik, ona vahşi bir hava katıyor. Sararmış gözleri öfkeyle dolu.{/n} "Hizmetkârınız ne kadar da yavaş konuşuyormuş. Ha, bacaklarını kessek bu mırıldanan hâlinden eser kalmazdı!"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
